message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $130?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, but $110 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $125. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I can do $115, can you meet me there?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $125, but I'm willing to make a small concession. I can offer it to you for $123. Is that something you'd be interested in?
I'm getting close to my limit, but I'm still a bit short. Can you do $120 for me?
